Smell event observer. This is a mix-in that can be added to any other classes. `class `**`SmellObserver`**` :   object`

Methods  

notifySmellEvent (event, source, info)

objects.t[896]

Receive notification of a smell event. This routine is called whenever a SmellEvent occurs within smelling range of this object.
